site.title: Akarsh Vante — Software Developer (AI / ML / Data Eng)
site.tagline: I build reliable ML systems and scalable data platforms that turn experimentation into production.

personal.name: Akarsh Chandrakant Vante
personal.role: Software Developer · AI / ML / Data Engineering
personal.summary: Software Developer with strong Python, SQL and analytical skills, specializing in data-driven solutions. Experienced building and deploying scalable, production-ready applications, writing optimized database queries, and applying core CS fundamentals to solve business problems in Agile teams.

education.degree: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: Sharad Institute of Technology and College of Engineering, Yadrav
Sharad Science and Commerce College, Yadrav

projects.name: GeminiVision — AI-powered Image Analyzer
projects.summary: An image analysis app integrating Google Gemini Pro with an interactive UI for uploads, visualization, and model explanations.

details.problem: Provide a fast, explainable image analysis experience for end users.
details.role: Lead developer — built integration, UI and deployment.
details.approach: Integrated Google Gemini Pro for inference, optimized preprocessing pipeline to reduce latency, added explainability overlays and interactive visualizations.
details.lessons: Optimizing preprocessing and batching can drastically reduce end-to-end latency for GenAI-backed apps.

projects.name: RAGChat — Multi-Document Q&A Bot
projects.summary: Retrieval-augmented chatbot using embeddings and vector DB to answer multi-document queries.
metrics: Query retrieval time reduced by 60% (per résumé).

details.problem: Fast, accurate answers from collections of documents.
details.role: Built retrieval pipeline, passage ranking, relevance filtering and context-windowing.
details.approach: Used embeddings + vector DB, implemented ranking and context selection to improve relevance and latency.
details.lessons: Smart passage ranking and context-windowing improves answer accuracy without large context windows.

projects.name: Sales BI Dashboard — Executive Sales Analytics
projects.summary: Executive sales dashboard with KPIs, cohort retention, and RFM analysis that reduced weekly reporting time.
metrics: Weekly reporting time cut by ~70% (per résumé).

details.problem: Manual, slow weekly reporting for stakeholders.
details.role: Built ETL, analytics, visualizations, and deployed via Streamlit Cloud.
details.approach: Automated ingestion, computed KPIs and cohorts, created exportable CSV and stakeholder insights.
details.lessons: Well-designed dashboards with exportable artifacts dramatically reduce manual reporting overhead.

experience.title: Technical Event Co-ordinator — Coding Club, SITCOE
experience.company: Sharad Institute of Technology and College of Engineering, Yadrav
highlights: Organized 2+ technical events (DSA, debugging, SQL challenges) with 100+ participants.
Mentored peers and collaborated with a 5-member team to manage logistics, boosting participation by 40%.

achievements: Solved 200+ problems on LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks (50+ SQL problems).
Participated in national-level hackathons: Innovation (SITCOE), Flipkart Grid 3.0 and Smart India Hackathon.
Built and deployed multiple production-ready AI applications using Python and cloud services.

certificates.name: Udemy: Complete Data Science, ML & DL (Krish Naik)
